Create Seed

Source: R/f_seed.R
createSeed.Rd

Returns one or more true random numbers which can be used as seed.

Usage

createSeed(numberOfValues = 1, minValue = 1e+06, maxValue = 9999999, ...)

Arguments

numberOfValues

a single integer value. Number of seeds to create, default is 1.

minValue

a single integer value. The minimum value that a seed can have, default is 1000000.

maxValue

a single integer value. The maximum value that a seed can have, default is 9999999.

...

optional arguments.

Value

an integer value or vector containing one or more seeds.

Details

RANDOM.ORG offers true random numbers to anyone on the Internet. The randomness comes from atmospheric noise, which for many purposes is better than the pseudo-random number algorithms typically used in computer programs. For more information see https://www.random.org.

See also

getSimulatedTwoArmMeans
